original_text: The Pharisees and the teachers of God's Law brought a woman to him. They had found her with another man. She was having sex with a man who was not her husband. They made her stand in front of all the people there.
korean_text: 서기관들과 바리새인들이 음행중에 잡힌 여자를 끌고 와서 가운데 세우고

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees and the teachers of God's Law
They had found her with another man
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그녀를 다른 남자와 함께 발견했습니다

sentences.original_text: She was having sex with a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 한 남자와 성관계를 하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: in front of all the people there
